attributes.action: Restrict the power of Ken Livingstone to overule the wishes of the community and their elected councilors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Livingstone has implemented expansion of the congestion Zone despite the result of the area survey. He has made it clear he intends to impose the London Tram extension despite local opposition and rejection by 3 Borough Councils. He has threatened Ealing council with finacial penalties if a congestion making Bus Lane is removed despite the residents of the area and the Local Council being in favour

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
